snippet: About 10 Highland games festivals are scheduled in California each year, including Scottish Fest in Costa Mesa over Memorial Day weekend, the largest such event in Southern California.
abstract: Highland games, with a mix of athletics, dance and musicianship, are regarded as an integral part of Scottish culture and heritage; 10 Highland games festivals are scheduled in California each year, and in many other states as well.
lead_paragraph: About 10 Highland games festivals are scheduled in California each year, including Scottish Fest in Costa Mesa over Memorial Day weekend, the largest such event in Southern California.

headline.main: What to Wear: Your Game Face and a Kilt
headline.print_headline: What to Wear: Your Game Face and a Kilt
